name: nf-gulp-translations
description: Gulp plugin for ensuring translation files have all needed resources
readme:
# gulp-translations > Gulp plugin to make sure translation resource files are valid. ## Install ``` $ npm install --save-dev gulp-translations ``` ## Usage ```js const gulp = require('gulp'); const translations = require('nf-gulp-translations'); gulp.task('default', () => { gulp.src('translations/*.json') .pipe(translations('translations/en-US.json')) .pipe(gulp.dest('dist')) ); ``` ## Structure of translation files ```json { "resource.key.name": "Resource text" } ``` ## API ### translations([masterFile], [options]) #### masterFile Translation file to use as master. If resource keys are missing from the other translation files, they will be copied from the master file. #### options ##### failMissing Type: `boolean`
Default: `false` Fails if resource key exists in master file but not in translation file. ##### failOrphan Type: `boolean`
Default: `false` Fails if resource key exists in translation file but not in master file. ## License MIT Â© [New by Sigma](http://mobility.sigmagroup.no/)
